The work shown can be attributed to the peoples of the Torres Strait for which of the following reasons?
choicesHtml: The inclusion of a lifelike portrait as part of the mask to honor matrilineal ancestors
The use of feathers associated with the gods to convey divine protection on the wearer during battle
The use of synthetic paint and glass beads as a result of trade with European sailors
The inclusion of human and animal features to reference a mythical hero and his totemic species
